overview: Early classics from director Matt Sterling. Collection of two short films from Falcon Studios and Dimension Films. "Ten Plus" — How big is big? Well, cock-starved young Tom discovers that Roger has got a piece of fuck meat that's a good 10 inches plus. And when a stud can plug a throat and pack an ass like Roger does, who's counting exactly how much 'plus' really is?  "Stud Farm" — Six orgasms are tallied when three beautiful and bronzed farm studs unite on a sunny country hillside for an afternoon of young-animal pleasures.
title: Ten Plus
